name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client-am.ipc.max-retries
description:
The number of client retries to the AM - before reconnecting
    to the RM to fetch Application Status.
    In other words, it is the ipc.client.connect.max.retries to be used during
    reconnecting to the RM and fetching Application Status.

name: dfs.namenode.max.full.block.report.leases
description:
The maximum number of leases for full block reports that the
    NameNode will issue at any given time.  This prevents the NameNode from
    being flooded with full block reports that use up all the RPC handler
    threads.  This number should never be more than the number of RPC handler
    threads or less than 1.

name: ipc.client.connect.retry.interval
description:
Indicates the number of milliseconds a client will wait for
    before retrying to establish a server connection.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.max-component-length
description:
Defines the maximum number of bytes in UTF-8 encoding in each
      component of a path.  A value of 0 will disable the check. Support
      multiple size unit suffix(case insensitive), as described in dfs.blocksize.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.containerlauncher.threadpool-initial-size
description:
The initial size of thread pool to launch containers in the
    app master.
